backgroundColor.comment: The background color of the image expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
graphAverageColor.comment: The color to use for the average line drawn across the fee rates chart
graphBorderColor.comment: The color to use for outlining charts and their labels
graphDataColors.comment: An array of colors to use for multi valued charts.
height.comment: The height, in pixels to generate the image.
interval.comment: The amount of time, in seconds, the script should wait before data gathering and image creation again
renderStatsImage.comment: Indicates whether the stats block image should be created
renderFeesImage.comment: Indicates whether the fee rates image should be created
renderSegwitImage.comment: Indicates whether the segwit prevalence image should be created
renderScriptImage.comment: Indicates whether images for script types should be rendered
reportStatsEnabled.comment: Indicates whether summary stats should be reported to log output
shapeOutlineColor.comment: The color to use for outlining the blockstats image charts
shapeShadowColor.comment: The color to use for shadow of the blockstats image
textColor.comment: The color of the text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
width.comment: The width, in pixels to generate the image.
